books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: An inexperienced college student falls in love with a tortured man who has particular sexual tastes; the first book in a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES OF GREY

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: The final book in an erotic trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES FREED

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: Ana Steele learns more about Christian Grey’s troubled past; the second book in a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES DARKER

books.author: by James Patterson and Michael Ledwidge
books.description: A young biologist warns world leaders about the reasons for escalating animal attacks on cities.
books.name: ZOO

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by Mitch Albom
books.description: A fable about the inventor of the world’s first clock, who returns to our world after centuries of banishment; from the author of “Tuesdays With Morrie.”
books.name: THE TIME KEEPER

books.author: by Sylvia Day
books.description: Two troubled people develop an intense, obsessive relationship.
books.name: BARED TO YOU

books.author: by Clive Cussler and Thomas Perry
books.description: Sam and Remi Fargo, a husband-and-wife treasure-hunting team, search for the tomb of Attila the Hun.
books.name: THE TOMBS

books.author: by Jayne Castle
books.description: Rachel, who can detect the auras of psychic criminals, may lose her sanctuary; by Jayne Ann Krentz, writing pseudonymously.
books.name: THE LOST NIGHT

books.author: by M. L. Stedman
books.description: An Australian lighthouse keeper and his wife decide to keep a baby who has washed ashore.
books.name: THE LIGHT BETWEEN OCEANS

books.author: by Tess Gerritsen
books.description: The detective Jane Rizzoli and the medical examiner Maura Isles protect a boy whose family have all been murdered.
books.name: LAST TO DIE

books.author: by Sylvain Reynard
books.description: Gabriel Emerson, a Dante specialist with a dark past, struggles to unravel his mysterious connection to Julia, a sweet and innocent graduate student.
books.name: GABRIEL’S INFERNO

books.author: by Katee Robert
books.description: A prim art gallery coordinator’s night of seduction winds up hooking the wrong man.
books.name: WRONG BED, RIGHT GUY

books.author: by Debbie Macomber
books.description: A young widow buys a bed-and-breakfast.
books.name: THE INN AT ROSE HARBOR

books.author: by  Beth Kery
books.description: Two more chapters in the serial erotic novel aout Francesc Arno and Ian Noble's passionate affair.
books.name: BECAUSE YOU ARE MINE, PART VI
